baseline_groups.claim_summary: Providing market access for quality maize increases farmer yield (tons/hectare).
baseline_groups.notes: ANCOVA specification: coef=0.294 (p=0.025). Season FE, clustered at village (ea_code).

global_notes: RCT in Uganda studying market access and quality upgrading for maize farmers. 54 specs. Yield effect robust to controls, sample restrictions, winsorization. Village FE substantially increases effect (to ~0.65). Pre-treatment placebo passes. Heterogeneity: stronger for small HH and close to road.
